data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Alabama.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Alabama, United States
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 4,908,000 people living in Alabama.
Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Alabama, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 1,296,016 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Alabama.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Mongolian, Peripheral people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Alabama to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Alabama, United States to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.section_summary:
the state of Alabama, United States has a population of 4,908,000.

We estimate Alabama has 1,296,016 people who might know Jesus, 2,458,157 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,153,827 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Alabama who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
